alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 9:02PM PST until February 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, except 6 to 12 inches above 1500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Central Coast Range of Western Oregon. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will vary between 500 and 1500 feet due to the showery nature of the precipitation.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon
